doc:
David Ryall https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Ryall 0 David John Ryall (5 January 1935 – 25 December 2014) was an English stage, film and television character actor. He had leading roles in Lytton's Diary and Goodnight Sweetheart, as well as memorable roles in Dennis Potter's The Singing Detective and Andrew Davies's adaptation of To Play the King. He also portrayed Billy Buzzle in the ITV sitcom Bless Me, Father and Frank in the BBC sitcom Outnumbered. David_John_Ryall ( 5_January_1935 – 25_December_2014 ) was an_English_stage , film_and_television_character_actor . He had_leading roles in Lytton 's_Diary_and_Goodnight_Sweetheart , as_well_as memorable_roles in Dennis_Potter 's_The_Singing_Detective and Andrew_Davies 's_adaptation of To_Play the_King . He also portrayed Billy_Buzzle in the_ITV_sitcom_Bless_Me , Father and Frank in the_BBC_sitcom Outnumbered .
